show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Manipulations And Lies
content:
The outright manipulation and mendacity of government-reported economic data is designed to obscure the truth and keep... <!--more--> the populace ignorant of the deception being perpetrated on them.
The people believe all the lies they are told, ignoring the facts, rejecting the obvious and refusing to use their common sense.
GDP… CPI…unemployment statistics… all lies.
There is a ton of statistics indicating virtually zero growth over the past five years.
Europe’s banks are teetering on the edge.
Loss provisions stand at just $780 billion or 55% of exposure.
The banking system is essentially insolvent.
Europe’s bad debt is just being kicked down the road.
It already exceeds 350% of GDP.
They are struggling to achieve even 1% growth.
All these bubbles are going to burst.
Growth in the US plummeted to 0.
1% in the first quarter.
Snow!
There’s your recovery!
